execution_plan.description: Select EU customers (from sales_eu) whose email is NULL or does not match a basic email regex pattern (invalid format).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customers.id AS s1__id, customers.full_name AS s1__full_name, customers.email AS s1__email FROM customers WHERE customers.email IS NULL OR NOT (customers.email ~ '^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$');
